description: The area is shaking off its reputation as hub of counterfeit and bad wine to become China’s new wine destination. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: China’s grape-growing region Penglai on a quest to make its wines fine
title_page: China’s grape-growing region Penglai on a quest to make its wines fine | The Straits Times
maintext:
PENGLAI, Shandong – Penglai, a place in China’s eastern Shandong province, is said to be the realm of the Eight Immortals of Chinese legend, where food never runs out and wine glasses are magically refilled.
And it is hoping to enchant more people with its alcoholic brews.
